thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Benchmark Electronics Qtrly Loss Per Share $1.54​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Benchmark Electronics Qtrly Loss Per Share $1.54​
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Benchmark Electronics Inc:
* BENCHMARK ELECTRONICS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FY 2017 RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.34 TO $0.38 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.27 TO $0.31 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $585 MILLION TO $605 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $680 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $1.54​ * QTRLY ‍DILUTED EPS - NON-GAAP $0.49​ * RESULTS ‍INCLUDES $1.95 PER SHARE FOR QUARTER AND $1.94 PER SHARE FOR FY OF TAX EXPENSE RELATED TO EFFECTS OF U.S. TAX LAW​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
